programme.title: Joe Swash: Forgotten Young Dads
programme.desc: Too often overlooked in research and marginalised in society, many young dads across the UK are quietly rewriting the rulebook on fatherhood. In this revealing documentary, Joe Swash, who became a first-time father in his mid-twenties, meets four young men navigating the challenges of parenting. From stigma and financial strain to isolation and emotional growth, this is the rarely seen lived experience of men in their teens and twenties entering into fatherhood.

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson and Richard Hammond are on location during the production of the `Sweeney movie, taking charge of shooting the films climactic car chase. Clarkson choreographs the stunt driving, whilst Hammond directs the lead actors and organises an explosive finale. Meanwhile, James May casts a suspicious eye over the new Vauxhall Corsa VXR Nurburgring and gives his verdict on the brand new Fiat Panda.

programme.title: Joe Swash: Forgotten Young Dads
programme.desc: Too often overlooked in research and marginalised in society, many young dads across the UK are quietly rewriting the rulebook on fatherhood. In this revealing documentary, Joe Swash, who became a first-time father in his mid-twenties, meets four young men navigating the challenges of parenting. From stigma and financial strain to isolation and emotional growth, this is the rarely seen lived experience of men in their teens and twenties entering into fatherhood.

programme.title: Celebrity Race Across the World
programme.desc: Four familiar faces - Roman Kemp, Dylan Llewellyn, Anita Rani and Molly Rainford - set off with a loved one on an epic 5,900km race through Central America. The race begins on Isla Mujeres, the easternmost point of Mexico.

programme.title: The Man Who Murdered His Family
programme.desc: Grant Amato enjoys a life of success and privilege before his obsession with a Bulgarian cam model lands him in the centre of a murder investigation.

programme.title: The Man Who Murdered His Family
programme.desc: Grant Amato is on trial for his life and the evidence is piling up against him; while the media focuses on cam model Silvie as the key to the case.

programme.title: The Man Who Murdered His Family
programme.desc: In prison, Grant becomes famous online after his case goes viral; Colin travels to Bulgaria in the hopes of finding Silvie, the one person who may hold the answers to this mystery.

programme.desc: Charlie and Lee are in Epsom to convert Jade and Jacks long, plain and unkempt garden into a sporty socialising space. Both are from avid sports-loving families. They would love a bar area to watch live football games, a place to host friends and chill, and a space to play competitive darts, football and bowls! Can the team achieve all this on a £5,000 budget?

programme.title: Impossible

programme.title: Great British Menu

programme.title: Natural World
programme.desc: On 12 September 2015, a 30 ton humpback whale breached and landed on Tom Mustill and his friend Charlotte Kinloch as they paddled a sea kayak in Monterey Bay, California. Incredibly, both survived the incident, but the near-death experience haunted documentary maker Tom and left him wondering if the whale was deliberately trying to hurt them. To find the answer, Tom returned to California in 2018 to investigate.

programme.title: Flog It!
programme.desc: Catherine Southon and Claire Rawle find some real gems at De Montfort Hall and Paul Martin discovers how local radio was born right here in Leicester.

programme.title: Richard Osmans House of Games
programme.desc: Every day this week, celebrity contestants Krishnan Guru-Murthy, Megan McCubbin, Ashley Storrie and Adam Woodyatt take on a series of quiz rounds selected by the host, quiz legend Richard Osman. A daily winner is declared following a quickfire round at the end of each show, and the scores are tallied across the week, resulting in an overall champion being crowned on Friday.

programme.title: Strictly Come Dancing: It Takes Two
programme.desc: Janette Manrara has more Strictly exclusives and behind the scenes gossip ahead of the weekend. Plus a star-studded Friday Panel discuss the couples next dances.

programme.title: Villages by the Sea
programme.desc: Ben Robinson travels to Seaton Sluice in Northumberland, home to the notorious Delaval family. These wealthy bottle makers were some of the greatest players on the Georgian party scene.

programme.title: Mortimer and Whitehouse: Gone Fishing
programme.sub-title: Rivers Towi and Cothi, Carmarthenshire: Sea Trout
programme.desc: A fishing trip down memory lane beckons for Paul and Bob as they re-visit the fishing spots Paul used to go to many years previously with his father. This is a special and very personal trip for Paul and with trusty Ted in tow, they venture deep into the Welsh countryside to fish the confluence of the beautiful rivers Towy and Cothi for fresh sea trout.

programme.title: Gardeners World
programme.desc: Frances Tophill is back at Damson Farm, lending a hand with autumn jobs in the garden. She learns of a clever recipe for making an architectural compost cake, plants a container with evergreens and spring bulbs, and takes hard wood cuttings from a tree with beautiful berries. Theres a teacher whos planted hundreds of apple trees on his allotment. Nick Bailey explores the science of how sun-loving plants must adapt to try and survive and thrive in the shade.

programme.title: Empire with David Olusoga
programme.desc: At its height the British Empire - the biggest the world has ever seen - ruled over a fifth of the worlds land surface and almost a quarter of its people. Scattered across the world are the ruins of the Empire, from slave fortresses and plantations to schools and railways. But perhaps the greatest legacy of the Empire is a living legacy. Today, there are billions of people around the world whose ancestors were part of the story of Empire.

programme.title: QI

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Chandler And Monicas Wedding - Part 1
programme.desc: Monica and Chandler prepare for their wedding. Meanwhile, Joey is starring in a movie with a prestigious actor with a spitting problem.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Chandler And Monicas Wedding - Part 2
programme.desc: Joey encounters problems trying to get off the movie set to officiate the wedding when the star turns up drunk.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Monica and Chandlers wedding reception is almost upstaged by the news that someone might be pregnant. Meanwhile, Ross tries to impress a pretty single woman, Chandler has troubles on the dance floor, and Joey hopes to impress Chandlers mums date - an important Broadway producer - with his acting ability.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Red Sweater
programme.desc: The girls speculate as to whos the father of Rachels baby, the guys scramble after Chandler loses the film from his wedding, and Monica wants to open the wedding gifts.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Everybody seems to know who the father of Rachels baby is except the man himself. Meanwhile, Phoebe and Joey lie about a gas leak to get into Monica and Chandlers apartment.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Ross and Rachels attempt to explain how they wound up in bed together quickly descends into an argument over who seduced who, until Ross shocks the room by announcing that he has the whole encounter on video. Meanwhile, Monica and Chandler return from their honeymoon, excited at the prospect of socialising with another just-married couple they met on the flight home.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Ross gets upset when Rachel goes out on a date with a handsome actor, Phoebe tries to prevent a chef from being sacked, and Chandler kills a co-workers promotion.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Halloween Party
programme.desc: At Monicas Halloween party, Phoebe meets the friendly fiance of her flighty twin Ursula, but becomes alarmed when she learns that her sister has misrepresented herself to her trusting future in-law.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Ross learns that a pregnant Rachel wants to move out and find a place of her own, so he suggests a vacancy in his building. Then he learns that the elderly occupant is not quite dead yet. Meanwhile, Phoebe is ecstatic when Eric dumps her twin sister Ursula and chooses her instead, and Monica comes unhinged when she suspects that her new maid is stealing her jeans, among other things.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Feeling guilty for denying Chandler a bachelor party, Monica hires a stripper to perform for him, without learning that shes a prostitute. Elsewhere, Rachels father learns about her pregnancy and plans to give Ross a piece of his mind.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: An old high-school friend of Monicas is invited to the Thanksgiving dinner with the gang, but Monica is unaware that he isnt exactly fond of Rachel. Meanwhile, Chandler and Phoebe pretend to be mesmerised by American football in order to avoid helping Monica in the kitchen, and Joey vows to devour the entire turkey single-handedly.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Chandler is aghast when Monica buys painfully expensive boots, and Phoebe tries to capitalise on her discovery that Ross son attends school with the son of rock star Sting.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Ross Step Forward
programme.desc: Ross new girlfriend wants to put their photograph on Christmas cards, Rachel eyes Joey as a possible romantic partner, and the newlyweds cope with Chandlers boss as he goes through a divorce.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Joey Dates Rachel
programme.desc: To prepare Joey for his big date the following night, Rachel eagerly agrees to go out with him for a rare night on the town. However, when each is pleasantly surprised with their newfound compatibility, they begin to regard each other in a way that no one could have predicted.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Chandler Takes a Bath
programme.desc: As Joey agonises over his secret affection for Rachel, Monica mistakenly thinks that he is infatuated with Phoebe. Meanwhile, Ross and Rachel promise not to try to find out the sex of their unborn child, but Rachel cant resist having a peek inside the doctors confidential folder. Also, Monica urges a reluctant Chandler to enjoy the soothing pleasures of a scented bath, but realises that shes created a tub monster.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Secret Closet
programme.desc: Joey rushes pregnant Rachel to hospital when she experiences pains. When Ross feels left out, Joey makes a gallant suggestion. Meanwhile, Chandler is surprised to discover what is behind the locked door of Monicas secret cupboard, and Phoebe gets the impression that Monica is enjoying one of her massages a little too much.

programme.title: Deadliest Catch
programme.desc: As the winter season arrives, the fleet braces for a global weather pattern known as Super El Niño, an atmospheric phenomenon forecast to unleash a gauntlet of cyclonic storms across the Bering Sea. Captains and crews prepare for the worst.

programme.desc: Mark and Digger recruit Patti Bryan to help make hot pepper moonshine and nearly blind themselves in the process. When Tickle over-orders blueberries for his restaurant, he has some explaining and shine-making to do.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers

programme.title: The Goldbergs

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory

This rare and prized piece belonged to Andys grandfather, who obtained it by chance after the Blitz. Her real father was a teenage boyfriend of her mums whod wanted to be part of his daughters life at the beginning but had then disappeared and not made contact for nearly 40 years. Jonathan Gaskarth was adopted at six weeks old and had such a happy adoption that hed never felt the need to search for his birth mother or father.

programme.title: Long Lost Family: Born Without Trace
programme.desc: Foundlings are people who were abandoned as babies, often in the first hours and days of their lives. Born without a trace, they have had no way to unlock the secrets of their past. By combining new DNA technology with painstaking detective work, the mysteries of people with unknown beginnings who are desperate for answers can now be solved. Presented by Davina McCall and Nicky Campbell, the team behind `Long Lost Family use an extraordinary new technique to try and identify birth families and find answers for people who have spent decades trying to find out where they came from.

programme.desc: With one week to go before the World Pipe Band Championships, the three bands are sharpening their competitive performances. Plus, we meet the next generation of piping stars.

programme.title: World War II and Cinema
programme.sub-title: D-Day, the Holocaust and the Atomic Bomb
programme.desc: As Hitlers reign comes to an end, the horrors of the Nazi holocaust are revealed in films like The Young Lions and Schindlers List.

programme.title: The Directors
programme.desc: A look at the life and careers of the superstar directing duo, known for films such as True Grit and the Oscar-winning Fargo.

programme.title: Discovering Film
programme.desc: A glimpse into the life and six-decade long career of Sir Ian McKellen, star of Richard III and X-Men, who has won many awards for his vast work in film.

programme.title: Tales of the Unexpected
programme.desc: A rich, lonely American comes to London to find his long lost family to share his life and fortune. Unfortunately, chance meetings with his flatmates have disastrous consequences.

programme.title: Tales of the Unexpected
programme.desc: When a pricey piece of art is stolen, its gallery owner gets his girlfriend to make copies of the painting to sell, but did the work ever leave the building in the first place?

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: An antiques dealer (Robert H. Harris) decides his art objects are too beautiful to sell. With Louise Larabee.

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: An insecure woman (Phyllis Thaxter) who cant control her drinking loses control at a cocktail party.

programme.title: The Great Songwriters
programme.desc: Steve Earle: The multi-Grammy-winning singer-songwriter discusses songwriting and his life in music, and performs a selection of songs including Copperhead Road and Goodbye.

programme.title: Opry Live
programme.sub-title: Jamey Johnson, Randy Houser, Megan Moroney, ERNEST
programme.desc: Concerts from the Grand Ole Opry for country music fans.

programme.title: Simon and Garfunkel: Old Friends On Stage

programme.desc: This fascinating programme tells the story of the music and artists that have influenced Bob Dylan throughout his career.

programme.title: Bob Dylan - The Other Side of the Mirror
programme.desc: Dylans historic Newport Folk Festival performances from 1963-65 are captured on The Other Side Of The Mirror. Watch his metamorphosis from folk prodigy to rocks fiercely confrontational poet, as he electrified and inspired an entire nation.

programme.title: Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen
programme.desc: Mikaela and Sam once again join forces with Optimus Prime again to save Earth from ruthless robot The Fallen.

programme.title: The Canterville Ghost
programme.desc: Sir Simon de Canterville has been haunting the grounds of his country estate for more than 300 years, but he soon meets his match when he tries to scare off a modern-day American family that just moved in.

programme.title: Riverdance
programme.desc: An Irish boy and a Spanish girl journey into the mythical world of the Megaloceros Giganteus who teach them to appreciate Riverdance as a celebration of life.

programme.title: LEGO DC Super Heroes: The Flash
programme.desc: Reverse-Flash manipulates the Speed Force to put The Flash into a time loop, which forces him to re-live the same day over and over again. The Flash must find a way to restore time and finally apprehend his worst enemy before all is lost.

programme.title: The Pirates! In an Adventure With Scientists
programme.desc: An inept swashbuckler decides to make an attempt to win the Pirate of the Year Award, and beat his rivals Black Bellamy and Cutlass Liz in a race to plunder the most booty. His journey takes him to Victorian London where the Pirate Captain must choose between winning Pirate of the Year, or helping his crew.

programme.title: The Emoji Movie
programme.desc: Three emojis embark on an epic adventure through a smartphone to save their world from being deleted.

programme.title: Curious George
programme.desc: Curious George is an inquisitive little monkey with an insatiable taste for adventure. Georges fun-loving enthusiastic nature endears him to new friends, but also lands him in a series of misadventures.

programme.title: The Adventures of Tintin: The Secret of the Unicorn
programme.desc: Tintin and his dog Snowy buy a model of a three-masted sailing ship `The Unicorn at a market and are immediately accosted by two people who both want to buy the model from Tintin. Tintin takes the model ship home and is later shot at and then kidnapped on board a ship with Snowy. Will they escape in time, and solve the mystery of the secret of the Unicorn?

programme.title: Home
programme.desc: After an alien race called the Boov take over Earth, a resourceful human girl becomes a banished Boovs ally.

programme.title: Shrek
programme.desc: The story of a reclusive green ogre called Shrek whose life of solitude is disrupted by a horde of refugees who have been banished by the evil Lord Farquaad. Determined to save his home, Shrek cuts a deal with the tyrant, who sets him a daunting task - if Shrek is ever to enjoy peace and quiet again, he must rescue Farquaads bride-to-be from a dangerous castle.

programme.title: How to Train Your Dragon
programme.desc: A young Viking with aspirations of becoming a dragon hunter befriends a young dragon himself and learns more about the creatures than he ever assumed.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 3
programme.desc: After reuniting with his long-lost father, Po must train a village of clumsy pandas to help him defeat a supernatural warrior who becomes stronger with each battle.

programme.title: The Boss Baby
programme.desc: A wildly imaginative seven-year-old boy discovers that his new brother, Boss Baby, is actually a spy on a secret mission, and only he can help thwart a dastardly plot that involves an epic battle between puppies and babies.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 2
programme.desc: Now graduating seniors, the Barden Bellas enter an international a cappella competition which no American team has ever won.

programme.desc: After the highs of winning the world championships, the Bellas find themselves split apart. But when they get the chance to reunite for an overseas USO tour, this group of awesome nerds will come together to make some music one last time.

programme.desc: After the highs of winning the world championships, the Bellas find themselves split apart. But when they get the chance to reunite for an overseas USO tour, this group of awesome nerds will come together to make some music one last time.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect
programme.desc: When a new student joins her colleges female a cappella group, she takes the women out of their comfort zone of traditional pieces and introduces them to innovative arrangements.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 2
programme.desc: Now graduating seniors, the Barden Bellas enter an international a cappella competition which no American team has ever won.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 2
programme.desc: Now graduating seniors, the Barden Bellas enter an international a cappella competition which no American team has ever won.

programme.title: The Bridge on the River Kwai
programme.desc: British POWs are ordered by their Japanese captors to construct a bridge of strategic importance and are happy to sabotage and delay the progress until their commanding officers orders them to continue the work unhindered to its completion, but are his actions tantamount to collaborating with the enemy?

programme.title: True Grit
programme.desc: John Wayne won an Oscar here as Rooster Cogburn, a lawman recruited by a teenager seeking revenge on her fathers murderer.

programme.title: The Boy in the Striped Pyjamas
programme.desc: When his fathers job results in a family move to the countryside, young German boy Bruno misses his old friends. Roaming the grounds of the large country house he now calls home, he discovers the huge fenced facility that his dad Ralf, a Nazi officer, now manages. Approaching it, Bruno meets Shmuel, a fellow youngster on the other side of the barbed wire, wearing what appears to be a pair of pyjamas.

programme.title: Dallas Buyers Club
programme.desc: Learning that he has AIDS, Ron Woodroof smuggles medicine into the United States to fight the disease.

programme.title: Jerry Maguire
programme.desc: A sports agent who makes the mistake of saying what he believes, finds himself sacked and abandoned by all his clients apart from small time footballer Rod Tidwell. Maguires personal life starts to fall apart as hes torn between love and money in Cameron Crowes metaphor on Americans need for success and money.

programme.title: Dear John
programme.desc: Whilst on leave, a Marine falls in love with a college student. The long-distance relationship is then tested when the Marine decides to re-enlist post-9/11.

programme.title: The Color Purple
programme.desc: A musical adaptation of Alice Walkers novel about the life-long struggles of an African-American woman living in the south during the early 1900s.

programme.title: Bob Marley: One Love
programme.desc: Jamaican singer-songwriter Bob Marley overcomes adversity to become the most famous reggae musician in the world.

programme.title: The Bodyguard
programme.desc: A Secret Service agent-turned-bodyguard finds danger and romance while protecting an entertainer from a stalker.

programme.title: Fifty Shades of Grey
programme.desc: An inexperienced student begins a daring affair with a controlling businessman whose sexual proclivities push the boundaries of pain and pleasure.

programme.title: Fifty Shades Darker
programme.desc: Shadowy figures from Christian Greys past threaten to destroy his rekindled romance with Anastasia Steele.

programme.title: Fifty Shades Freed
programme.desc: Believing theyve left behind the shadowy figures from the past, billionaire Christian Grey and his new wife, Anastasia, fully embrace their inextricable connection and shared life of luxury. But just as the Greys begin to step into their new roles, sinister events come to light and jeopardise their happy ending before it even begins.

programme.title: Fifty Shades Freed

But just as the Greys begin to step into their new roles, sinister events come to light and jeopardise their happy ending before it even begins.

programme.title: The Wiz
programme.desc: In this version of the classic story - based on the smash Broadway musical - Dorothy is a shy 24-year-old Harlem kindergarten teacher who is brought by a snowstorm to the mysterious Land of Oz, a sprawling, decaying, nightmarish, and dangerous megalopolis that resembles the physical characteristics of New York City.

programme.title: Finding Neverland
programme.desc: Its London in 1904, and writer JM Barrie is inspired by a family he meets, mother Sylvia and her four children, Peter, Jack, George and Michael. From the time he spends with them, he writes the famous childrens novel `Peter Pan.

programme.title: Robin and the Hoods
programme.desc: For the tenacious 11-year-old Robin and her loyal band of friends The Hoods, the patch of overgrown scrubland at the end of their cul-de-sac is a magical kingdom.

programme.title: Johnny English Reborn
programme.desc: A haphazard spy returns to MI-7 after years in a Tibetan monastery honing his zen skills. Armed with gizmos, gadgets and chaotic luck he takes on a global ring of assassins.

programme.title: The Wiz
programme.desc: In this version of the classic story - based on the smash Broadway musical - Dorothy is a shy 24-year-old Harlem kindergarten teacher who is brought by a snowstorm to the mysterious Land of Oz, a sprawling, decaying, nightmarish, and dangerous megalopolis that resembles the physical characteristics of New York City.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: A magic portal transports the little blue people to Manhattan, where they must find a way back to their village before evil wizard Gargamel can find them.

programme.title: The Smurfs 2
programme.desc: Papa and the rest of the Smurfs reunite with their human friends to rescue Smurfette from the clutches of evil wizard Gargamel.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Four unlikely warriors rise from the sewers and join forces with fearless reporter April ONeil to save New York from Shredder and his evil minions.

programme.title: Charlie and the Chocolate Factory
programme.desc: Charlie Bucket comes from a poor family, and spends most of his time dreaming about the chocolate that he loves but usually cant afford. Things change when Willy Wonka, head of the very popular Wonka Chocolate empire, announces a contest in which five gold tickets have been hidden in chocolate bars. Charlie is one of the five kids who finds a lucky ticket and goes on a tour of Wonkas chocolate factory.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
programme.desc: Magizoologist Newt Scamander, two sisters and a No-Maj battle dark forces while tracking down magical creatures set free in the wizarding world of 1926 New York.

programme.title: The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie
programme.desc: Theres trouble brewing in Bikini Bottom. Someone has stolen King Neptunes crown, and it looks like Mr Krab, SpongeBobs boss, is the culprit. Though hes just been passed over for the promotion of his dreams, SpongeBob stands by his boss, and along with his best pal Patrick, sets out on a treacherous mission to Shell City to reclaim the crown and save Mr Krabs life.

programme.title: Look Whos Talking
programme.desc: Mollie is a pregnant woman whose partner has deserted her. When she goes into labour, friendly taxi driver James rushes her to hospital and the pair become firm friends. He slowly falls in love with her and her baby Mikey, but shes still looking for her perfect partner, not realising hes right under her nose. However we can hear Mikeys thoughts, and he wants James as his Dad.

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: A toy company develops action-figure soldiers whose realistic fighting capabilities cause mayhem for a toy-shop owner and his family. Unaware of their military prowess, the shop keeper takes delivery of the soldiers, who break free from their packaging to attack their Gorgonite enemies. When the Gorgonites communicate with the shop keepers son, the humans find themselves under siege.

programme.title: Small Soldiers

Unaware of their military prowess, the shop keeper takes delivery of the soldiers, who break free from their packaging to attack their Gorgonite enemies. When the Gorgonites communicate with the shop keepers son, the humans find themselves under siege.

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber
programme.desc: A pair of idiotic friends set off on a madcap journey to return a briefcase to its owner. However, they are blissfully unaware that the case contains a large amount of ransom money for the owners kidnapped husband. Their trip is soon fraught with disaster, especially when the kidnappers begin to pursue them across the country with the aim of grabbing the cash.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Job Hunting
programme.desc: Fancy a career change? This week, the Cinema List goes hunting for jobs with these film names as a guide. From `The Mechanic to `The Accountant, dust off your CV with these hardworking hits.

programme.title: Quadrophenia
programme.desc: A rebellious teen vents his anger with the Mods and the Rockers in 1964 London. Based on the album by the Who.

programme.title: Shane
programme.desc: A former gunslinger must strap on his six-shooter once again to defend homesteaders from a greedy cattle baron.

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Live-action version of the classic stone-age cartoon series. Fred Flintstone donates his family savings to help neighbour Barney Rubble and wife Betty adopt a child, much to the dismay of mother-in-law Pearl. To return the favour, Barney swaps slabs with Fred in an aptitude test, resulting in Freds being promoted and becoming involved in an embezzlement plot, while Barney is left in the dole queue.

programme.title: Singin in the Rain
programme.desc: When the transition is being made from silent films to `talkies, everyone has trouble adapting. Don and Lina have been cast repeatedly as a romantic couple, but when their latest film is remade into a musical, only Don has the voice for the new singing part. After a lot of practise with a diction coach, Lina still sounds terrible, and Kathy, a bright young aspiring actress, is hired to record over her voice.

programme.title: Kingpin
programme.desc: An ex-professional bowler and his talented Amish protege hustle their way across the country to a big-money tournament.

programme.title: Groundhog Day
programme.desc: A cynical TV weatherman finds himself reliving the same day over and over again when he goes on location to the small town of Punxsutawney to film a report about their annual Groundhog Day. His predicament drives him to distraction, until he sees a way of turning the situation to his advantage.

programme.title: The Shining
programme.desc: Frustrated writer Jack Torrance takes a job as the winter caretaker at the ominous, mountain-locked Overlook Hotel so that he can write in peace. When he arrives there with his wife and son, they learn that the previous caretaker had gone mad. Slowly Jack becomes possessed by the evil, demonic presence in the hotel.

programme.title: Last Action Hero
programme.desc: Eleven-year-old Danny is given a magic ticket by a strange projectionist and is transported into the cinema screen. Thanks to his advance knowledge of the plot, he is able to help his silver-screen hero out of an awkward situation and becomes his partner. Theres trouble in store for the unlikely duo when the villain tries to seize the magic ticket.

programme.title: Superman
programme.desc: Portraying the early years of the man of steel, from his birth on the planet Krypton to his arrival on Earth and the first of his epic battles with the arch-criminal Lex Luthor. The superhero must prevent Luthors nefarious scheme to rearrange the west coast of America with the help of a couple of nuclear bombs.

programme.title: Superman II
programme.desc: Having fallen in love with Lois, Superman agrees to sacrifice his powers to be with her. His last act as a superhero has an unexpected side effect, when a bomb he hurls into space to save the Eiffel Tower accidentally releases the three villains trapped in the `Phantom Zone in the first `Superman movie. The super criminals set about conquering the Earth, while Clark sits helpless.

programme.title: Superman III
programme.desc: Clark Kents class reunion is disrupted when a villain forces a computer genius to help destroy Superman. Based on DC Comics characters.

programme.title: Superman IV: The Quest for Peace
programme.desc: World leaders want Superman to intervene in the arms race, but he is caught in a dilemma - having vowed never to interfere in history. He eventually agrees to destroy all nuclear weapons, but then comes face to face with the android Protean Man, Lex Luthors latest evil creation. Luthor wants to stoke up the arms race, and sees the android - made from Kryptonite - as the only way to stop Superman.

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber
programme.desc: A pair of idiotic friends set off on a madcap journey to return a briefcase to its owner. However, they are blissfully unaware that the case contains a large amount of ransom money for the owners kidnapped husband. Their trip is soon fraught with disaster, especially when the kidnappers begin to pursue them across the country with the aim of grabbing the cash.

Luthor wants to stoke up the arms race, and sees the android - made from Kryptonite - as the only way to stop Superman.

Stylish historical epic retelling the fierce battle at Thermopylae in 481BC. The Spartan king, Leonidas, and his tiny army of 300 followers provided inspiration for the whole of Greece as they fought the massed ranks of the Persian army whose commander, King Xerxes, had up to a million warriors at his disposal.

programme.title: 300: Rise of an Empire
programme.desc: Greek Gen. Themistocles leads the charge to fight invading Persian forces led by the god Xerxes -- once a mortal -- and Artemisia.

programme.title: Men in Black
programme.desc: The secretive Men in Black are agents charged with regulating the aliens who have settled on Earth and ensure that they remain undetected. New recruit J and his partner K must find and stop an intergalactic terrorist bent on assassinating two ambassadors from opposing galaxies before they can make peace.

programme.title: Men in Black II
programme.desc: Sequel to the sci-fi comedy about a top secret government task force set up to deal with unruly extraterrestrials. An MIB agent turns to the only man who can help him save the world from a rampaging, shape-shifting alien which has taken on the outward appearance of a sexy lingerie model.

programme.title: Men in Black 3
programme.desc: Agent J goes back to the swinging 60s in a time-travelling mission to save his partner from a murderous alien.

programme.title: Shrek
programme.desc: The story of a reclusive green ogre called Shrek whose life of solitude is disrupted by a horde of refugees who have been banished by the evil Lord Farquaad. Determined to save his home, Shrek cuts a deal with the tyrant, who sets him a daunting task - if Shrek is ever to enjoy peace and quiet again, he must rescue Farquaads bride-to-be from a dangerous castle.

programme.title: Shrek 2
programme.desc: Ogre Shrek and his new wife Fiona are surprised to discover a letter from her parents, inviting them over for dinner. Fiona is eager to show off her new husband, but her parents dont yet know shes an ogre. Taking Donkey along, they set off for Far Far Away to visit them, but the trip is hampered by the jealousy of a wicked fairy godmother and her hired assassin, Puss in Boots.

programme.title: Shrek the Third
programme.desc: Shrek is just starting to settle down in his beloved swamp with his wife Fiona, but their mucky bliss doesnt last for long as word arrives that the ogres froggy father-in-law is about to croak. The very last thing Shrek wants is to become King, but with no other heir in sight, it looks like the grumpy green one is destined never to live quietly in the swamp again. A glimmer of hope appears in the form of heir Artie.

programme.title: Shrek Forever After
programme.desc: Looking for the days when he felt like a `real ogre, shrek makes an ill advised pact with Rumpelstiltskin. Banished to a Shrek-less version of the land of Far Far Away, the unfortunate ogre must once again win the love of Princess Fiona if hes to ever get back home.

programme.title: Robin Hood: Prince of Thieves
programme.desc: On his return from the Crusades, Robin of Locksley learns that his father has been murdered by the tyrannical Sheriff of Nottingham and embarks on a campaign of guerrilla warfare to protect King Richards throne. Fight scenes are lively and inventive, and a set piece fought under the forest canopy pulls out all the stops.

programme.title: Gladiator II
programme.desc: Lucius must enter the Colosseum after the powerful emperors of Rome conquer his home. With rage in his heart and the future of the empire at stake, he looks to the past to find the strength and honour needed to return the glory of Rome to its people.

Stylish historical epic retelling the fierce battle at Thermopylae in 481BC. The Spartan king, Leonidas, and his tiny army of 300 followers provided inspiration for the whole of Greece as they fought the massed ranks of the Persian army whose commander, King Xerxes, had up to a million warriors at his disposal.

programme.title: 300: Rise of an Empire
programme.desc: Greek Gen. Themistocles leads the charge to fight invading Persian forces led by the god Xerxes -- once a mortal -- and Artemisia.

programme.title: Aquaman and the Lost Kingdom
programme.desc: Black Manta wields the power of the mythic Black Trident to unleash an ancient and malevolent force. Hoping to end his reign of terror, Aquaman forges an unlikely alliance with his brother to protect their kingdom and save the world from destruction.

programme.desc: Looking for the days when he felt like a `real ogre, shrek makes an ill advised pact with Rumpelstiltskin. Banished to a Shrek-less version of the land of Far Far Away, the unfortunate ogre must once again win the love of Princess Fiona if hes to ever get back home.

programme.title: Robin Hood: Prince of Thieves
programme.desc: On his return from the Crusades, Robin of Locksley learns that his father has been murdered by the tyrannical Sheriff of Nottingham and embarks on a campaign of guerrilla warfare to protect King Richards throne. Fight scenes are lively and inventive, and a set piece fought under the forest canopy pulls out all the stops.

programme.title: Gladiator II
programme.desc: Lucius must enter the Colosseum after the powerful emperors of Rome conquer his home. With rage in his heart and the future of the empire at stake, he looks to the past to find the strength and honour needed to return the glory of Rome to its people.

Stylish historical epic retelling the fierce battle at Thermopylae in 481BC. The Spartan king, Leonidas, and his tiny army of 300 followers provided inspiration for the whole of Greece as they fought the massed ranks of the Persian army whose commander, King Xerxes, had up to a million warriors at his disposal.

programme.title: 300: Rise of an Empire
programme.desc: Greek Gen. Themistocles leads the charge to fight invading Persian forces led by the god Xerxes -- once a mortal -- and Artemisia.

programme.title: Aquaman and the Lost Kingdom
programme.desc: Black Manta wields the power of the mythic Black Trident to unleash an ancient and malevolent force. Hoping to end his reign of terror, Aquaman forges an unlikely alliance with his brother to protect their kingdom and save the world from destruction.

programme.title: Y2K
programme.desc: On the last night of 1999, two high school juniors crash a New Years Eve party, only to find themselves fighting for their lives when Y2K becomes a reality.

programme.title: Psycho Therapy: The Shallow Tale of a Writer Who Decided to Write About a Serial Killer
programme.desc: A writer befriends a retired serial killer in a desperate attempt to find inspiration for his next novel and save his marriage. Covering as his marriage counselor, the killer teaches him his methods as reality becomes deadlier than fiction.

programme.title: Ick
programme.desc: Science teacher Hanks life changes when he reconnects with his first love and suspects a new student is his daughter, all while facing an alien threat in their town.

programme.title: The Stranger in My Home
programme.desc: Ali meets a mysterious man who claims to be the father of her teenage daughter, Katie. What begins as an unsettling encounter soon spirals into a nightmare of long-buried secrets, lies and obsession.

programme.title: Psycho Therapy: The Shallow Tale of a Writer Who Decided to Write About a Serial Killer
programme.desc: A writer befriends a retired serial killer in a desperate attempt to find inspiration for his next novel and save his marriage. Covering as his marriage counselor, the killer teaches him his methods as reality becomes deadlier than fiction.

programme.title: The Woman in the Yard
programme.desc: Ramona becomes crippled by grief after the death of her husband, leaving her to care for her two children alone in her farmhouse. Her sadness soon turns to fear when a spectral woman in black appears on her front lawn, warning her "todays the day."

programme.title: Companion
programme.desc: A weekend getaway turns bloody and violent when a subservient android thats built for human companionship goes haywire.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Out of Darkness
programme.desc: A desperate band of early humans finds a new land to settle in some 45,000 years ago. As they start to realise that something monstrous is hunting them down, they must confront a horrifying danger that they never could have imagined.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Monolith
programme.desc: While trying to salvage her career, a disgraced journalist begins investigating a strange conspiracy theory. However, as the trail leads uncomfortably close to home, shes left to grapple with the lies at the heart of her own story.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Gothika
programme.desc: A strange car accident leaves criminal psychiatrist Miranda with amnesia and locked up in her own prison, accused of murdering her own husband, the director of the hospital. Haunted by terrifying spirits, she must escape to save her sanity.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Jules
programme.desc: A mans quiet life gets upended when a UFO crashes in his backyard in rural Pennsylvania. As he befriends the mysterious extraterrestrial, things start to get complicated when two neighbours discover it and the government quickly closes in.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Sick
programme.desc: While quarantining at her familys lake house during the pandemic, Parker and her best friend are threatened by an unexpected visitor.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Secret of Marrowbone
programme.desc: A young man and his younger siblings who have concealed the death of their mother in order to remain together are plagued by a sinister presence in their home.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Theres Something in the Barn
programme.desc: Bill moves his American wife Carol and children Nora and Lucas to Norway where hes inherited a family estate. There, Lucas discovers a mischievous barn elf from ancient folklore living in the barn who elf plots to get rid of the American intruders.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Cloverfield
programme.desc: A leaving party for New Yorker Rob Hawkins is rudely interrupted by the arrival of an unwelcome guest, something that has a penchant for smashing up skyscrapers, playing football with the Statue of Libertys head and handpicking humans as snacks.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: 10 Cloverfield Lane
programme.desc: A woman discovers the horrifying truth about the outside world while living in an underground shelter with two men.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Terminator Salvation
programme.desc: After the triumph of the machines on Judgement Day and with killer robots hunting down the last vestiges of humanity, resistance fighter John Connor battles back. However, the arrival of a mysterious stranger threatens to tip the balance in favour of the machines.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Invisible Man
programme.desc: After staging his own suicide, a crazed scientist uses his power to become invisible to stalk and terrorise his ex-girlfriend. When the police refuse to believe her story, she decides to take matters into her own hands and fight back.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Smile 2
programme.desc: Global pop sensation Skye Riley begins to experience increasingly terrifying and inexplicable events. Overwhelmed by the escalating horrors and pressures of fame, she must face her dark past to regain control of her life.

programme.title: Hero
programme.desc: To the court of the King of Qin, who seeks to rule the united country, comes Nameless, who claims to have killed three deadly assassins who were all determined to kill the King. As Nameless recounts his exploits in flashback, each time the wily King responds with his version. Is Nameless a true servant of Qin or does he have a secret agenda?

programme.title: Hand of Death
programme.desc: A young monk must face the Extended Iron Claw technique of a powerful warlord seeking to destroy Shaolin.

programme.title: Zu, Warriors From the Magic Mountain
programme.desc: A young warrior travelling through a magical world becomes involved in the battle between good and evil.

programme.title: Reindeer Games
programme.desc: An ex-cons plan to pose as his late cellmate backfires when he is roped into a casino heist on Christmas Eve.

programme.title: The Holiday
programme.desc: Dumped and depressed, English rose Iris agrees to swap homes with similarly unlucky in love Californian Amanda for a much-needed break. Iris finds herself in a palatial Hollywood mansion while Amanda navigates the lanes of a picture-perfect English village. Soon enough, both lovelorn ladies bump into local lads perfect for a romantic pick-me-up.

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Weaving in and out of the love lives of eight loosely inter-related couples. The bachelor Prime Minister falls for his personal assistant, his brother-in-law is flirting with one of his colleagues, a writer heads off to France and pursues an affair with a maid, and an 11-year-old boy asks his father for advice on matters of the heart.

programme.title: Arthur Christmas
programme.desc: Everyone knows that, each Christmas, Santa Claus delivers presents to every last child on Earth. What everyone doesnt know is that Santa accomplishes the feat with a very high-tech operation beneath the North Pole. But when the unthinkable happens, and Santa misses one child out of hundreds of millions, someone has to save the day. Its up to Arthur (James McAvoy), Santas youngest son, to deliver a present to the forgotten tyke before Christmas morning dawns.

programme.title: The Grinch
programme.desc: The Grinch and his loyal dog, Max, live a solitary existence inside a cave on Mount Crumpet. His main source of aggravation comes during Christmastime when his neighbours in Whoville celebrate the holidays with a bang. When the Whos decide to make Christmas bigger and brighter, the disgruntled Grinch realises there is one way to gain peace and quiet. With help from Max, the green grump hatches a scheme to pose as Santa Claus, steal Christmas and silence the Whos holiday cheer once and for all.

programme.title: Elf
programme.desc: Finding out that hes actually human, Buddy the elf leaves the North Pole to find his real dad in bustling New York, but when he gets there, his mean old dad doesnt want to know. While hes trying to convince his father, he gets a job as a department store elf, which he should be perfectly cut out for.

programme.title: Love Actually

programme.title: Gremlins
programme.desc: A placid small town is brought to its knees by an infestation of destructive small creatures with a vicious sense of humour.

programme.title: Fred Claus
programme.desc: Santas bitter big brother has to find his Christmas spirit before the season is ruined for the whole world.

programme.title: Fred Claus
programme.desc: Santas bitter big brother has to find his Christmas spirit before the season is ruined for the whole world.

programme.title: Layer Cake
programme.desc: A London cocaine dealer wants to retire with his millions and his health intact, but mob boss Price has other ideas, dragging him into a set-up involving a missing junkie, a million stolen tablets of `E and an East European hitman.

programme.title: Absolution
programme.desc: An ageing Boston gangster tries to reconnect with his family and fix the mistakes from the past, but his criminal lifestyle soon threatens to destroy everything he holds dear.

programme.title: To Catch a Killer
programme.desc: A troubled police officer is recruited by the FBIs chief investigator to help profile and track down a disturbed individual terrorising Baltimore, Maryland.

programme.title: Psycho
programme.desc: Gus Van Sants remake of the Hitchcock classic about an embezzler who checks into a remote motel run by a psychopath. While remaining faithful to the original, the modern setting and slightly more explicit shots than the censor would allow in Hitchcocks day make this a fascinating exercise that compares favourably to the original.

programme.title: In the Line of Fire
programme.desc: A Secret Service agent is taunted by calls from a would-be killer who has detailed information about the agent - including the fact that he failed to save President John F Kennedy from assassination. The caller is revealed as an ex-CIA assassin, and the agent, who is investigating a threat to the current president, is determined not to let history repeat itself.

programme.title: Jack Reacher
programme.desc: A defence attorney hires an enigmatic ex-Army investigator to tackle the case of a highly trained sniper who apparently murdered five people at random.

programme.title: Oceans Eleven
programme.desc: Slick crime caper in which a thief, recently released from prison, rounds up a team of top criminals to rob three Las Vegas casinos owned by the man who is now dating his ex-wife.

programme.title: Oceans Twelve
programme.desc: Casino mobster Benedict knows who stole his money and he wants it back. Danny and his crew of thieves have just two weeks to steal $190m, or their lives will be forfeit, but who is the mystery thief competing for the loot? This time Benedicts ex-girlfriend is on their side, even an integral part of the plan.

programme.title: Split
programme.desc: A man diagnosed with 23 separate personalities kidnaps and imprisons three teenage girls, who must try to escape before his terrifying 24th personality finally comes to light.

programme.title: Snatch
programme.desc: Based on three hybridising narrative strands, three groups of villains are intent on retrieving a missing diamond. Turkish and Tommy team up with a pugilistic Irish gypsy named Mickey for the purpose of rigging unlicensed boxing matches. However, their opponent also arranges some dodgy betting with the courier of the stolen diamond, who subsequently goes missing. To complicate further, a New York gangster arrives on the scene.

programme.title: Layer Cake
programme.desc: A London cocaine dealer wants to retire with his millions and his health intact, but mob boss Price has other ideas, dragging him into a set-up involving a missing junkie, a million stolen tablets of `E and an East European hitman.

programme.title: Hannibal
programme.desc: The outwardly charming and intelligent psychopath Dr Lecter is in Florence, masquerading as a museum curator. A greedy cop discovers his true identity, and plans to hand him over to someone willing to pay, but things do not go to plan when female FBI agent Clarice Starling gets a call to help Lecters only living victim - the hideously deformed Mason Verger.

programme.title: Worlds Most Evil Killers

programme.title: Dogtown and Z-Boys
programme.desc: In mid-70s America, skateboarding was a fad in danger of dying out, until a small group of surfers in Santa Monica began moving to extremes in both lifestyle and techniques, using their skills in empty swimming pools and the streets to create a new form of skateboarding. Director Stacy Peralta, who was one of the group, weaves home footage of their early days with interviews with those still in the scene.

programme.title: The Directors
programme.desc: Carol Reed: A closer look at the life and career of the Academy Award-winning British director behind acclaimed films Odd Man Out, Oliver! and The Fallen Idol.

programme.desc: Focusing their attention on Dwight Baker, the FBI intercepts a call with "Uncle Jerry" that leads them to capture evidence of a game piece exchange; the FBI works overtime to launch a coordinated cross-country day of indictments.

programme.title: Discovering Film

programme.desc: Keith Raniere is found guilty on all charges; he is sentenced to 120 years; his supporters work to exonerate him, and he plans to appeal; Nancy Salzman comes to a painful reckoning; she is sentenced to 42 months in federal prison.

programme.sub-title: The Story of Zed The Hero of Africa

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries
programme.desc: Go behind the scenes at Kenyas largest and busiest private game reserve, Ol Pejeta Conservancy.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries
programme.desc: The mass relocation of an endangered species of hartebeest from a game reserve to Ol Pejeta occurs so that the land can be resettled by refugees.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries
programme.desc: Two white rhinos are moved to Ol Pejeta from a nearby ranch after they discovered that poachers had been watching the animals.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries
programme.desc: With the number of elephants on the rise, as do the numbers of conflicts. Ol Pejeta has to deal with a gang of crop raiding elephants. The order is given to detusk 3 elephants, but first the team will have to remove a collar from a blind elephant.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries
programme.desc: A look at the plight of chimpanzees that survive the bush meat trade to become captive animals. Sweetwater sanctuary is home to 50 chimpanzees. At the same time, we look at the reintroduction of colubus monkeys into the Ewaso river area of Ol Pejeta.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries
programme.desc: Ol Pejeta Conservancy is Kenyas largest and busiest private game reserve, a vast reserve that covers 85.000 acres and is home to over 15.000 animals, including some of Africas rarest and most endangered species.

programme.title: The Predators Playbook
programme.desc: An exploration of the unique features that allow predators to survive in often hostile environments,. such as speed and agility to undetectable camouflage.

programme.title: Wildlife ER
programme.desc: Check out vet Phils clever tactics for handling prickly patients and marvel as RSPCA rescuer Chantel extracts a sooty possum duo from a chimney. Cheer on the clinics favourite survivor and see vet Meaghan unhook a curlew whos the catch of the day.

programme.title: Wildlife ER
programme.desc: The team scramble to help a trio of troubled baby wallabies and a koala having seizures. Plus, a kookaburra has feather-implant surgery and a spoonbill gets corrective shoes.

programme.title: Pride Rules
programme.desc: Say hello to a season of plenty as flood waters recede and vast herds of prey return to the Chobes banks. Watch Keeza and her cub make a break for it.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: A look at the lives of monkeys, chimps, orangutans, and apes living at the worlds biggest sanctuary, the 65-acre Monkey World Ape Rescue Centre in Wareham, Dorset.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: A look at the lives of monkeys, chimps, orangutans, and apes living at the worlds biggest sanctuary, the 65-acre Monkey World Ape Rescue Centre in Wareham, Dorset.

programme.title: Patrick Aryees Wild World
programme.desc: Patrick travels to Yellowstone National Park, where he discovers the positive, top-down domino effect that wolves have on their environment.

programme.title: Patrick Aryees Wild World
programme.desc: Is our appetite for salmon wiping out the lynx? Join Patrick Aryee as he seeks answers to this curious question.

programme.title: Pridelands: Wilderness Reborn
programme.desc: An Australian family go on an adventure to restore an old hunting ranch in South Africa. Their goal is to rebuild the overgrown habitat, create an eco-tourism ranch, and allow the natural wildlife, including predators, to move back in.

programme.title: Attenboroughs Journey
programme.desc: Follow David Attenborough around the globe as he films David Attenboroughs First Life.

programme.title: David Attenboroughs Rise of Animals: Triumph of the Vertebrates
programme.sub-title: From the Seas to the Skies
programme.desc: David Attenborough uses fossil evidence and CGI to reveal the story of the vertebrates, from their humble origins as the primitive fish that once swam in ancient seas, to their radical move onto land and beyond.

programme.title: David Attenboroughs Rise of Animals: Triumph of the Vertebrates
programme.desc: David Attenborough uses fossil evidence and CGI to reveal how mammals developed from tiny forest dwellers to become the dominant life form on the planet.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas
programme.desc: Come face-to-face with alphas who use might to subdue enemies, from sea lions and cape buffalo to Canada geese and lionesses.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas
programme.desc: Meet the ugliest alphas of the animal world, from warthogs and giant African bullfrogs to wild turkeys and Nile crocodiles.

programme.title: Super Shark Highway
programme.desc: Two teams of researchers investigate the migration patterns of the oceans largest and deadliest sharks. They follow their underwater routes and show their hunting behaviours, and social hierarchies.

programme.title: The Wadden Sea
programme.desc: As an abandoned seal pup navigates heavy storms and hungry predators, hares fight for females, brent geese prepare to fly to the high Arctic and more.

programme.title: The Wadden Sea
programme.desc: While shell ducks forage and defend their home, young rabbits discover theyre not safe and spoonbills fight over nests.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas
programme.desc: Come face-to-face with alphas who use might to subdue enemies, from sea lions and cape buffalo to Canada geese and lionesses.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas
programme.desc: Meet the ugliest alphas of the animal world, from warthogs and giant African bullfrogs to wild turkeys and Nile crocodiles.

programme.title: Super Shark Highway
programme.desc: Two teams of researchers investigate the migration patterns of the oceans largest and deadliest sharks. They follow their underwater routes and show their hunting behaviours, and social hierarchies.

programme.title: The Secret Life Of The Hermit Crab
programme.desc: Dives into the life cycle of hermit crabs in Guadeloupe as they embark on their migration journey to release their eggs into the ocean.

programme.desc: When a prominent atheist leader is kidnapped and murdered, Detectives Goren and Eames interview the victims granddaughter who was also kidnapped.

programme.desc: As police make an arrest the suspect lashes out and catches the camera firmly with his feet. A mum is caught driving her daughter to school with no tax, insurance or even a driving license!

programme.title: Stop Search Seize
programme.desc: Join Irelands Customs teams as they, with the help of the Irish police, try to stop organised smugglers from bringing drugs, cars and even exotic animals into the country.

programme.title: Send in the Dogs UK
programme.desc: Billy the spaniel is the new sniffer on the block. He goes with his handler PC Derek Beattie on an assignment to find drugs, but finds something just as interesting - live ammunition. Meanwhile, PC John Lane and his spaniel Paddy are also on an early morning drugs raid. Their mission leads to a haul of Class A narcotics hidden in a childs bedroom.

programme.title: Border Security: Americas Front Line
programme.desc: Follow US border protection agencies as they man the front lines of national security.

programme.title: UK Border Force
programme.desc: The UK Border Agency is an uninvited guest at sham weddings in Birmingham and Glasgow, while a Brazilian man wanting to see his British husband is stopped at Heathrow where checks reveal a string of lies.

programme.title: Brit Cops: Frontline Crime UK
programme.desc: In West Wales, Britains toughest cops take on violent drunks and drug dealers, while traffic officers have a change of scenery as they combat vandals terrorising walkers in the mountains. Plus, an armed response unit is called to a dangerous domestic incident with more than one knife involved.

programme.title: The Rookie
programme.desc: As the rookies prepare for a big exam to see who moves on to the next stage of training, Nolan and Bishop are called to the scene of a murder and learn that the victim may be tied to a potential terrorist attack on the city of Los Angeles.

programme.title: Great American Railroad Journeys
programme.desc: Following his Appletons guide, Michael Portillo makes a trip to the jewel in the crown of Americas National Parks, Yosemite, to behold its towering granite cliffs, its giant sequoia trees and cascading waterfalls. He discovers how early conservationists fought to protect it in law and encounters a `buffalo soldier in the heart of the forest. In Berkeley, Michael uncovers a catastrophic event, which hit the city of San Francisco hard in 1906.

programme.title: Great American Railroad Journeys
programme.desc: Steered by his late 19th-century Appletons guidebook, Michael Portillo continues through southern California aboard the Coast Starlight rail service. In the historic port of Monterey, Michael raises the Bear Flag of the one-time Republic of California and above it, the Stars and Stripes. He discovers the citys Spanish and Mexican heritage and traces how the former fishing port described as `stinking and decrepit in John Steinbecks novel, `Cannery Row, has become a beacon for tourists.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: There is a triple collection of desirable cars in store for Derek when an MG Midget, an Austin-Healey frogeye Sprite and an RS2000 come up for auction.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Daves son Jack is heading out to Cheshire to collect two cars with a 35-year age difference. And luckily for Mathewsons, Lucy knows exactly what has been brought in for auction.

programme.title: World at War
programme.desc: Hitler turns his tanks towards Russia. After a succession of devastating victories, the Germans delay fatally, and the fierce Russian winter takes a grip.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce and the team arrive at Brooklands Motor Racing and Aviation Museum, near Weybridge in Surrey. Thousands flock to the paddocks, where the experts are on duty. Amongst the objects exciting their interest are a risque bust found abandoned in a garden, rare artefacts recording the Bluebird attempts to break world speed records, an old chest given away on the internet and valuable aboriginal tools.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce and the experts return to the Brooklands Motor Racing and Aviation Museum near Weybridge for another busy day of valuations. Objects brought before the cameras include a rare and highly valuable stirrup cup, books once owned by Churchill and rescued from a garden fire, and a remarkable bracelet given to Queen Victoria that was found in a gutter. Plus Fiona welcomes the return of a friendly Roadshow face.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Dereks search for the unusual lands him a 1947 Lea Francis thats half-made of wood. Paul heads for the countryside to pick up a Morris one tonne truck.

programme.desc: Dave and Jack head to East Yorkshire to pick up a dusty Alfa Romeo and a 1930s Jowett. But Daves more taken with a possible Christmas present - a Carry On-style, bum-wobbling exercise machine.

programme.title: World at War
programme.desc: Hitler turns his tanks towards Russia. After a succession of devastating victories, the Germans delay fatally, and the fierce Russian winter takes a grip.

programme.title: Indian Ocean with Simon Reeve
programme.desc: On Sri Lanka, the Chinese are building a huge new port and their money has helped the Sri Lankan government bring a 30-year war to a brutal end. Simon Reeve also visits the north of the island - the scene of vicious battles between fighters from the Tamil minority and the Sri Lankan army. Heading north to Bangladesh, Simon investigates one of the Indian Oceans fastest growing industries - providing prawns.

programme.title: Porridge
programme.desc: Experienced inmate Fletcher, the old hand, gives the benefit of his experience to his green young cell mate, Lennie Godber, and whats extremely important is to know how not to rub up that horrible Mr MacKay the wrong way.

programme.title: Great American Railroad Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo strikes oil in the suburbs of Los Angeles, contemplates his navel in the orange groves of Riverside, makes a California roll and paints a pretty picture in Laguna Beach. It is Mexican Independence Day and the locals are celebrating the countrys hard-won independence from Spain in the early 19th century.

programme.title: Great American Railroad Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillos nineteenth-century Appletons guidebook leads him to the Parker House Hotel, where in his best pinny, he whisks up a Boston cream pie. In the fine dome atop Massachusetts General Hospital, where no-one could hear the screaming, Michael discovers the scene of grisly surgery, first made bearable, in 1846, by a miraculous new substance. North of Boston, in Salem, Michael is caught up in a witch hunt.

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: Mike and Frank pick a few people who may, or may not, be from another world.

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: Mike and Frank hit the road in search of rides manufactured by the godfather of the American auto industry, Henry Ford.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: A super low mileage Renault Dauphine proves irresistible to the Resto team... But its 1959 mechanics ensure some hefty bills.

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It
programme.desc: Henry Cole and Simon OBrien are in the Cotswolds competing to see who can create the most profit on two old lamps, and they take a spin in a Devonshire fire engine.

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It
programme.desc: Henry Cole calls in a safe cracker to bring a safe back from the scrap heap, and a ships wheel is left in splinters when Henry falls out with restorer Guy.

programme.title: Fred Dibnahs World of Steam, Steel and Stone
programme.desc: A look at Freds appreciation for the skills of craftsmen and women of the past and of the work of people who carry on the traditions today.

programme.title: Fred Dibnahs World of Steam, Steel and Stone
programme.desc: From the labourers and stonemasons who built the great medieval castles and cathedrals, to 20th-century coalminers, mill workers and steel workers. For Fred, the real heroes were the ordinary workers without whose hard graft nothing would have been possible.

programme.title: Fred Dibnahs Magnificent Monuments
programme.desc: Focuses on the development of the fortress, featuring examples in Warwick, Edinburgh and Conwy. At Hadrians Wall Fred marvels at the design of Roman toilets, and hes joined by a band of knights in armour to test a castles defences.

programme.title: Fred Dibnahs Magnificent Monuments
programme.desc: This film celebrates the grandeur of Hampton Court Palace and visits Cragside, one of the first homes to have electric lighting. Fred Dibnah also examines restoration work on a 15th century manor house.

programme.title: Fred Dibnahs Industrial Age
programme.desc: Beginning with a look at the early use of wind and water power, Fred traces the development of the steam engine and visits a man who has built a windmill in his own back garden. He then sets off in search of early beam engines that are still functioning today.

programme.title: Fred Dibnahs Industrial Age
programme.desc: Travelling from the Scottish countryside of New Lanark to Burnley, Fred talks to ex-weavers about life in the mills and meets a group of volunteers who have spent 30 years saving mill engines.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek heads to Sunderland to pick up a real Italian beauty - a 1972 Lancia Fulvia Zagato. Red and racy, the car has seen better days, but Dereks still impressed.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Up for sale at the Mathewsons auction is a 1275 Mini GT thats come from just down the road and could be a future British icon.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek swaps the chaos of the office for rain-soaked Ripon to collect a 1965 Ford Anglia with just 33,000 miles on the clock. Meanwhile, Dave enjoys the clean lines of a rare Renault Caravalle.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Paul sets out for County Durham in order to collect both a 1936 Singer Le Mans sports car and a pristine 1957 Lambretta LD 150. In the meantime, Derek gets his hands on a 1962 MGA MK2 Coupe.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek is reunited with the vehicle he took his driving test in, a 1957 Ford 100E Estate. Meanwhile, Paul heads north to collect a 50-year-old MGBGT that still smells like a new car.

programme.desc: A young woman with a troubled past embarks on a dangerous mission. Her goal is to help her younger brother, who is imprisoned in a foreign jail.

programme.desc: During the Indo-Pakistani War, IAF squadron leader Vijay Karnik reconstructs a damaged landing strip in 72 hours with the help of local women.

programme.title: Ready
programme.desc: A case of mistaken identity that leads to love. An accountant and his family concoct a grand scheme to win the heart of a woman.

programme.desc: After a foe with a vendetta comes up with a sinister plan, Tiger embarks on a mission to protect his family and clear his name.

programme.desc: A young medical student falls in love with a man who plans to travel the world and never settle down or get married.

programme.title: Jolly LLB 2
programme.desc: A lawyer hoodwinks a woman to start his own law firm. However, he feels guilty after he finds out that she committed suicide and her husband was a victim of injustice and tries to make things right.

programme.desc: Raja comes to the conclusion that the easiest path to wealth is by marrying a rich girl, so he poses as a professor at a college to attract one of the wealthy female students.

programme.desc: A driven young woman embarks on a journey to fulfil a mothers promise for a better life as she overcomes challenges and loss while crossing paths with a man who further complicates her life.

programme.desc: Embracing love above all, strong-willed Saas-Bahus keep the Viranis together. But when conspirators try to create a rift, will their familial bond prevail?
